types.section:
{{fr-adj}}

# (only with ''bien'' or ''mal'') Having a good or bad [[disposition]], in a good or bad [[mood]]
types.html:
luné (feminine lunée, masculine plural lunés, feminine plural lunées)

  1. (only with bien or mal) Having a good or bad disposition, in a good or bad mood
trans: Having a good or bad disposition, in a good or bad mood
Having a good or bad disposition, in a good or bad mood
